author: google
title: Music AI Sandbox, now with new features and broader access
content: Helping music professionals explore the potential of generative AI
rawContent: Helping music professionals explore the potential of generative AI

author: google
title: Introducing Gemini 2.5 Flash
content: Gemini 2.5 Flash is our first fully hybrid reasoning model, giving developers the ability to turn thinking on or off.
rawContent: Gemini 2.5 Flash is our first fully hybrid reasoning model, giving developers the ability to turn thinking on or off.

author: google
title: Generate videos in Gemini and Whisk with Veo 2
content: Transform text-based prompts into high-resolution eight-second videos in Gemini Advanced and use Whisk Animate to turn images into eight-second animated clips.
rawContent: Transform text-based prompts into high-resolution eight-second videos in Gemini Advanced and use Whisk Animate to turn images into eight-second animated clips.

author: google
title: DolphinGemma: How Google AI is helping decode dolphin communication
content: DolphinGemma, a large language model developed by Google, is helping scientists study how dolphins communicate — and hopefully find out what they're saying, too.
rawContent: DolphinGemma, a large language model developed by Google, is helping scientists study how dolphins communicate — and hopefully find out what they're saying, too.

author: google
title: Taking a responsible path to AGI
content: We’re exploring the frontiers of AGI, prioritizing technical safety, proactive risk assessment, and collaboration with the AI community.
rawContent: We’re exploring the frontiers of AGI, prioritizing technical safety, proactive risk assessment, and collaboration with the AI community.

author: google
title: Evaluating potential cybersecurity threats of advanced AI
content: Our framework enables cybersecurity experts to identify which defenses are necessary—and how to prioritize them
rawContent: Our framework enables cybersecurity experts to identify which defenses are necessary—and how to prioritize them

author: google
title: Gemini 2.5: Our most intelligent AI model
content: Gemini 2.5 is our most intelligent AI model, now with thinking built in.
rawContent: Gemini 2.5 is our most intelligent AI model, now with thinking built in.

author: google
title: Gemini Robotics brings AI into the physical world
content: Introducing Gemini Robotics and Gemini Robotics-ER, AI models designed for robots to understand, act and react to the physical world.
rawContent: Introducing Gemini Robotics and Gemini Robotics-ER, AI models designed for robots to understand, act and react to the physical world.

author: google
title: Experiment with Gemini 2.0 Flash native image generation
content: Native image output is available in Gemini 2.0 Flash for developers to experiment with in Google AI Studio and the Gemini API.
rawContent: Native image output is available in Gemini 2.0 Flash for developers to experiment with in Google AI Studio and the Gemini API.

author: google
title: Introducing Gemma 3
content: The most capable model you can run on a single GPU or TPU.
rawContent: The most capable model you can run on a single GPU or TPU.

author: google
title: Start building with Gemini 2.0 Flash and Flash-Lite
content: Gemini 2.0 Flash-Lite is now generally available in the Gemini API for production use in Google AI Studio and for enterprise customers on Vertex AI
rawContent: Gemini 2.0 Flash-Lite is now generally available in the Gemini API for production use in Google AI Studio and for enterprise customers on Vertex AI

author: google
title: Gemini 2.0 is now available to everyone
content: We’re announcing new updates to Gemini 2.0 Flash, plus introducing Gemini 2.0 Flash-Lite and Gemini 2.0 Pro Experimental.
rawContent: We’re announcing new updates to Gemini 2.0 Flash, plus introducing Gemini 2.0 Flash-Lite and Gemini 2.0 Pro Experimental.
